markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Synchronize Steps](/Spells.aspx?ID=1126)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 95

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 2 willing creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You link the minds of two targets, enabling them to move in tandem. When one of the targets Steps, the other target can use a reaction to Step. When one of the targets Strides, the other target can use a reaction to Stride.

---
**Heightened (5th)**  The range increases to 60 feet, and you can target up to 10 willing creatures.
name: Synchronize Steps
